alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Garland; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Perry; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Logan, western Perry, northwestern Garland, northeastern Scott and Yell Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1200 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mount Magazine to near Stonehouse Recreation Area to near Cardiff. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Ola... Magazine... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Cardiff... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Mount Magazine... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Belleville... Havana... Casa... Corinth... Birta... Nimrod... Ranger... Wing... Olio... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
